subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Royals’ bullpen has a 2.30 earned run average this postseason, and the relievers Greg Holland, Wade Davis and Kelvin Herrera have helped the team win all six of its postseason games.
snippet: The Royals’ bullpen has a 2.30 earned run average this postseason, and the relievers Greg Holland, Wade Davis and Kelvin Herrera have helped the team win all six of its postseason games.
